mapper.select: select distinct work_part from staffs where branch_seq=#{branchSeq} and join_date is not null and leave_date is null

select s.staff_id, u.gender, u.name, u.profile_photo, u.birth, s.work_part from staffs s, users u where s.staff_id=u.user_id and branch_seq=#{branchSeq} and join_date is not null and leave_date is null
select u.profile_photo, u.name, u.gender, u.birth from users u, staffs s where s.branch_seq=#{branchSeq} and s.join_date is null and u.user_id=s.staff_id order by u.name asc

select u.profile_photo, u.name, u.gender, u.birth from users u, staffs s where s.branch_seq=#{branchSeq} and s.join_date is not null and s.leave_date is not null and u.user_id=s.staff_id order by u.name asc
mapper.insert: insert into staffs (staff_seq, staff_id, branch_seq, bank_name, account_num, resume_file, health_file, bank_file) values(staff_seq.nextval, #{staffId}, #{branchSeq}, #{bankName}, #{accountNum}, #{resumeFile}, #{healthFile}, #{bankFile})
